scripts.prepublish: (node-gyp --arch=ia32 rebuild && copy .\build\Release\clr.node .\compiled\win32\ia32\clr.node) & (node-gyp --arch=x64 rebuild && copy .\build\Release\clr.node .\compiled\win32\x64\clr.node) & node-gyp rebuild
scripts.install: node-gyp rebuild || echo "build failed. using precompiled module but you may need VC redist (http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=30679)."
